resources.string: This uses the platform default transition. This typically presents the new view with a partial slide up and fade.
This does a translation animation on the incoming scene for it to slide in from the right.
This transition does uniform scale up from the center of the screen.
This transition scales up the next scene from a specific portion of the current scene.
This transition does a fade out on the current view and a fade in on the incoming view.
This transition animates shared elements between two scenes. Shared elements automatically transition between states on both screens.
This transition uses a circular reveal to animate in the background. A delayed slide in animation is used on the header.
